**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 109 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Deities** [Liisglan](/Deities.aspx?ID=540), [Telastmar](/Deities.aspx?ID=549) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Saving Throw** Fortitude --- By suddenly altering gravity, you pull the target toward you. The target is [pulled](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 10 feet closer to you unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save. On a critical failure, it's also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). The effects of this spell change depending on the number of actions you spend when you Cast this Spell. **(somatic)** The spell targets one creature.
**(somatic, verbal)** The spell targets one creature and pulls the target 20 feet instead of 10.
**(material, somatic, verbal)** The spell targets up to 5 creatures.
name: Gravitational Pull
